name: womanly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
Womanly qualities, ideas, or physical features are ones that a woman is typically or traditionally thought to have: She referred in a positive way to the "traditional womanly goals of marriage and motherhood" several times in her talk. She used her womanly wiles/charms to persuade him to change his mind. Synonym
feminineCompare
ladylike old-fashioned
manly approving
Related word
womanliness
Add to word list
Add to word list
having qualities thought typical of a woman
